name: Jelly Jousting
description:
WINDOWS ONLY

In this hotseat 2 player game, face your opponent using the WASD key (green) or the arrow keys (red) to move while using the space bar (green) or the 'K' key (red) to shoot them down. Kill the other player to win. Escape to exit the game.

Tell me if anything doesn't work.

This game was made in 12 hours by me.
